title: Ballot Design and Invalid Vote Reduction Strategies: Behavioral Economics-Based Experimental Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Combined smartphone-based mobile learning with small-group workshops, emphasizing experimental activities simulating real election experiences

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of ballot design elements (font, layout, instructional phrases, etc.) on invalid vote rates
Design an educational voting simulation tool applying behavioral economics principles to reduce learner error rates by 30% or more
Write an experimental report deriving optimal voting guidance strategies using A/B testing methodologies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
